# qvac-lib-infer-ggml-base

This is the base class for QVAC Inference Addon libraries run via ggml runtime.

## API Reference

### Methods

- `loadWeights(filepath)`: Fetch the weights file from configured loader

## Installation

```bash
npm i @tetherto/infer-ggml-base
```

## Error Range
Errors in this library have a range from 5001 to 6000.

## Current Implementations

- [`marian`](https://github.com/tetherto/qvac-lib-infer-nmtcpp)
- [`whisper`](https://github.com/tetherto/qvac-lib-infer-whispercpp)
- [`llama`](https://github.com/tetherto/qvac-lib-infer-llamacpp-llm)

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please feel free to submit a Pull Request. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.
